com.openkm.module.jcr.stuff.apache

类 TextFilterExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.openkm.module.jcr.stuff.apache.TextFilterExtractor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.jackrabbit.extractor.TextExtractor

    public class TextFilterExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.jackrabbit.extractor.TextExtractor
    Adapter class for achieving backwards compatibility with classes implementing the deprectated TextFilter interface. This class implements the TextExtractor interface through calls to an underlying TextFilter instance.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TextFilterExtractor(java.lang.String[] types, TextFilter filter)
      Creates a text extractor adapter that supports the given content types using the given text filter.
      TextFilterExtractor(java.lang.String type, TextFilter filter)
      Creates a text extractor adapter that supports the given content type using the given text filter.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.io.Reader extractText(java.io.InputStream stream, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String encoding)
      Extracts the text content of the given binary stream by calling the underlying TextFilter instance.
      java.lang.String[] getContentTypes()
      Returns the supported content types.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TextFilterExtractor

        public TextFilterExtractor(java.lang.String[] types,
                   TextFilter filter)
        Creates a text extractor adapter that supports the given content types using the given text filter.
        参数:
        types - supported content types
        filter - text filter to be adapted

      • TextFilterExtractor

        public TextFilterExtractor(java.lang.String type,
                   TextFilter filter)
        Creates a text extractor adapter that supports the given content type using the given text filter.
        参数:
        type - supported content type
        filter - text filter to be adapted

    • 方法详细资料

      • getContentTypes

        public java.lang.String[] getContentTypes()
        Returns the supported content types.
        指定者:
        getContentTypes 在接口中 org.apache.jackrabbit.extractor.TextExtractor
        返回:

      • extractText

        public java.io.Reader extractText(java.io.InputStream stream,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String encoding)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the text content of the given binary stream by calling the underlying TextFilter instance. A dummy PropertyState instance is created to comply with the TextFilter.doFilter(PropertyState, String) method signature.
        指定者:
        extractText 在接口中 org.apache.jackrabbit.extractor.TextExtractor
        参数:
        stream - binary stream
        type - content type
        encoding - character encoding, or null
        返回:
        reader reader for the extracted text content
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the adapted call fails
